mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.* FROM( SELECT TT1.no, TT1.board_seq as boardSeq, TT1.answer_seq as answerSeq, TT1.contents as contents, TT1.mod_id as modId, DECODE( TO_CHAR(TT1.mod_dt, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(TT1.mod_dt, 'HH24:MI'), TO_CHAR(TT1.mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') ) AS modDt FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS no, T1.* FROM( SELECT * FROM answer WHERE 1=1 AND board_seq = #{searchWord} ORDER BY mod_dt DESC ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + #{pageSize}) ) TT1 WHERE TT1.no >= (#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo} - 1) + 1) )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM answer WHERE 1=1 AND board_seq = #{searchWord} )B
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer ( board_seq, contents, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{board_seq}, #{contents}, #{regId}, #{regId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET contents = #{contents}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = SYSDATE WHERE answer_seq = #{answerSeq}
